channel.title: Comments on: To Increase Your Resilience, Avoid Being Too Hard On Yourself.
channel.description: Strategies to recover from stress quickly

item.title: By: Robin
item.dc:creator: Robin
item.description: What about those who struggle with just being "normal", with doing well enough to survive, because we're not able to do as well as everyone else? I don't want to be perfect, just to stop "running to stand still" because I'm not as able as everyone else?
item.content:encoded: What about those who struggle with just being “normal”, with doing well enough to survive, because we’re not able to do as well as everyone else? I don’t want to be perfect, just to stop “running to stand still” because I’m not as able as everyone else?
